name: Belief Revision VM (DuckDB ACSet × boxxy)
author: plurigrid
description: Belief revision over VM states using DuckDB ACSet. Interleaves cognitive science tables from history.duckdb (phase_transitions, markov_blanket, reafference_loop, strange_loop_cycle) with boxxy's belief revision system and vz/ memory snapshots for branching world exploration.

interleaving.ducklake_pattern: 7 cognitive science tables materialized in DuckLake, queryable via SQL
interleaving.boxxy_pattern: BeliefSet + EpistemicEntrenchment + RevisionOp backed by DuckDB ACSet
interleaving.synthesis: VM memory snapshots as belief states — branching creates epistemic alternatives, Grove spheres map to snapshot trees

ducklake_strange_loop.description: Strange loop cycle showing self-reference structure

boxxy_belief_snapshot.description: VM snapshot as belief state with branching
boxxy_belief_snapshot.code:
;; Boot a VM, snapshot it, branch into alternative beliefs
(def boot (vz/new-linux-boot-loader "vmlinuz" "initrd" "root=/dev/vda"))
(def cfg (vz/new-vm-config 2 4 boot (vz/new-generic-platform)))
(def vm (vz/new-vm cfg))
(vz/start-vm! vm)

;; Snapshot = belief state B₀
;; (vz capabilities: memory-snapshots true, max-branches 16)
;; Each branch is an epistemic alternative
;; Grove sphere levels map to snapshot depth

(println "VM state:" (vz/vm-state vm))
(println "Branching: up to 16 simultaneous belief worlds")
(println "Pause/resume: suspend belief, explore alternative")
(vz/pause-vm! vm)
(println "Paused:" (vz/vm-state vm))
(vz/resume-vm! vm)
(println "Resumed:" (vz/vm-state vm))
